tool.name: astropy fits2bitmap
tool.help:
usage: fits2bitmap [-h] [-e hdu] [-o filename] [--stretch STRETCH] [--power POWER] [--asinh_a ASINH_A] [--min_cut MIN_CUT] [--max_cut MAX_CUT] [--min_percent MIN_PERCENT] [--max_percent MAX_PERCENT] [--percent PERCENT] [--cmap colormap_name] filename [filename ...]
Create a bitmap file from a FITS image.
positional arguments: filename Path to one or more FITS files to convert output filename Filename for the output image (Default is a PNG file with the same name as the FITS file).
stretch STRETCH Type of image stretching ("linear", "sqrt", "power", "log", or "asinh") (Default is "linear"). cmap colormap_name matplotlib color map name (Default is "Greys_r").
